ygData.subject: Re: Is the verdict finally in?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh - you might see that anyway.  Last night I saw a level 10 wizard in a flowing black robe, shimmering orb, and one of those skull staves running from an
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 27 Aug 1999, Trevalien Manix wrote:

> From: "Trevalien Manix" <trevalien@...>
>
> I realy hope this is wrong...If a cheat becomes available i will quit EQ. I
> can imagine me saving up to get my banded cape (the last peice i need for
> full banded i think) and i see a lvl 1 ranger walk past me with Full Thorny
> Vine Armor, A Darkwood Bow, Fish Bone Earings, and A Pegasus Cloak. (those
> are the items on my wishlist). I would probably chalange him to a dual but
> he might kick my ass in that stuff!
>

Heh - you might see that anyway. Last night I saw a level 10 wizard in
a flowing black robe, shimmering orb, and one of those skull staves
running from an orc centurion in the E. Commonlands.

--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
